show.title: Ranching Reboot
show.summary: Rebooting your thinking about Farming, Ranching and Food production. Conversations in land stewardship with some of today's most innovative ranchers and producers. Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/ranching-reboot/support

title: #98 Aaron Traffas "Different Perspectives"
subtitle: #98 Aaron Traffas "Different Perspectives"
summary:
I toured over to my friend Aaron Traffas' farm to see some of the things he has cooking on the other side of the county, and we spent some time in his studio having this awesome conversation that you don't want to miss!
Aaron gets me talking about a number of things including fake meat, soil health and the future of food systems. He's also a talented musician and since day one has been a supporter.
The music I've been using for the intro and outro is an Aaron Traffas Band original titled "Red Dirt Farm"  Yes, there's an outro in the background of the last 1:45 of every episode.
